metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34256 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.3.3. There is an out-of-bounds read in crc16 in lib/crc16.c when called from fs/ext4/super.c because ext4_group_desc_csum does not properly check an offset. NOTE: this is disputed by third parties because the kernel is not intended to defend against attackers with the stated "When modifying the block device while it is mounted by the filesystem" access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34256` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1109-aws - 5.4.0-1109.118~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1112-gcp - 5.4.0-1112.121~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-162-generic - 5.4.0-162.179~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-162-lowlatency - 5.4.0-162.179~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1056-ibm - 5.4.0-1056.61~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1108-oracle - 5.4.0-1108.117~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.4.0-1093-raspi - 5.4.0-1093.104~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1109-aws - 5.4.0-1109.118~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1112-gcp - 5.4.0-1112.121~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-162-generic - 5.4.0-162.179~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-162-lowlatency - 5.4.0-162.179~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1056-ibm - 5.4.0-1056.61~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1108-oracle - 5.4.0-1108.117~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> disputed CVE as it is claimed that it is expected to have the kernel crashed if a block device is modified while mounted.
